body.name: ComfiLife Premium Comfort Seat Cushion - Non-Slip Orthopedic 100% Memory Foam Coccyx Cushion for Tailbone Pain - Cushion for Office Chair Car Seat - Back Pain & Sciatica Relief (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 2 hrs
FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs
features: Assist in Back Pain & Sciatica Relief - Ergonomically designed, provides support and comfort while reducing pressure on the tailbone with the U-shaped cut out for healthy posture. Supports recovery from lower back problems, helps with most sitting pain due to sciatica, herniated discs, tailbone injuries, pregnancy, hip pain and hemorrhoids. Our seat cushion is designed to help relieve pain while sitting however it may not work for all conditions or completely eliminate all pain symptoms

All-in-one High Density Memory Foam Cushion - ComfiLife's all-in-one features are unrivaled: Non-slip rubber bottom, built-in handle for easy transport and machine-washable zippered velour cover for easy cleaning. Made with quality memory foam. Product Dimensions: 17.5 x 13.7 x 2.8 inches

For Office Chair, Driving and Traveling - Provides comfort on most hard surfaces; office chair, desk chair, kitchen, car seat, airplane, rocking chairs and wheelchairs, office use, truck drivers, frequent travelers, sporting events and pregnancy. ComfiLife Seat Cushion may not fit perfectly some contoured car seats and large chairs. ComfiLife Coccyx Cushion will provide less support with increasing weight. For optimal support recommended weight is up to 225 lbs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and well made
reviews.reviewText: I have two of the ComfiLife pillows. One for home and one for my office chair. With significant back problems, these cushions provide support and comfort for sitting. Excellent support for a reasonable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Genuinely GREAT product for the relief of lower back pain.
reviews.reviewText: I did not know what to expect when I purchased the Coccyx Cushion. The lower back pain I experience can become so intense throughout the day that I decided it certainly could not cause more pain.I work on a computer network five to six days per week. The hours of work per day varies from eight to twelve depending on what I encounter and needs immediate attention. Thus the priority for me was placing the Coccyx Cushion on the chair at my desk.The continuous battle against the pain in my lower back and long hours worked per day, wears me down physically, emotionally and mentally. These factors combined are exhausting! Relief comes in the form of going straight to bed at the end of the day.Sleeping is an escape from the pain, and necessary for me to have any stamina the following day.I was not getting to spend much time with my wife in the evenings - but she understood, and we just made it work.The only thing that I have changed in the past six months is the purchase of the Coccyx Cushion. The first time I sat down on the cushion, I felt comfort from the design…as if it was made specifically for me.When I was twelve, I fell off a skateboard straight down onto my tailbone - Coccyx. I broke the Sacrum which contains five (fused) vertebrae (S1-S5). The Sacrum vertebrae are directly above the Coccyx which is made up of four vertebrae. Three of the vertebrae are fused. The Sacrum vertebrae are directly below the Lumbar vertebrae – of which there are five (L1—L5).A spine specialist has reviewed my X-rays and MRI. During a consultation, the spine specialist along with a neurosurgeon informed me that surgery would not be an option in this case due to the proximity of the break to my spine. They showed me the MRI, the break in the vertebrae and the proximity to my spinal column.It was shocking for me to see how close I came to something far worse than lower back pain. Now, if the pain becomes extreme, I remind myself that paralysis from the waist down could have been the result if the break had severed my spine.The Coccyx Cushion provides me with indescribable relief. The design consists of a gap that allows my spine NOT to be in contact with anything below the cushion. The mere fact that my spine is not in compression against something solid (the surface of a chair) is what provides me with such incredible relief.I am so glad that I followed my curiosity to try the Coccyx Cushion. It provides me so much relief that I purchased a second cushion. The second cushion makes it possible for me to take it with me and place it wherever I choose to sit. With this option, driving or riding in a car has become a much more comfortable and tolerable part of daily life.Today, I no longer need to take the maximum dosage of acetaminophen/day. I rarely think about acetaminophen! Taking less acetaminophen pleases both my doctor and my wife – the damage of taking too much acetaminophen can cause severe liver damage.If this all sounds "a little too good to be true" I would entirely agree with you...IF I was not experiencing the pain relief myself.I have no affiliation with anyone connected with the concept, design, production, sales or business marketing of this product.I am not receiving any compensation from anyone for this review. I am sharing the facts as I have experienced them personally. I provided this review for those who choose to seek the relief that this unique product can provide.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good, comfy, but ‘sometimes’ i dont feel it works

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like the quality. It’s made very well. It’s firm and molds to your body.
reviews.reviewText: I work from home and sit in front of my laptop. Due to Osteoporosis I have intense pain in the lower part of my back. The very fist day I used this cushion I could tell the difference in my back. I was able to sit for longer periods without excruciating pain. The cushion does work and I highly recommend. I will purchase another one for my car. I am very happy with my purchase. Thank you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great cushion - love the level of firmness and memory foam it has. Great to use on long road trips. I initially bought this cushion back in 2018 and it did lose some of its firmness over time but it was not until now that I had to replace it. Make sure you do register the cushion once you receive it as they do honor the lifetime warranty and replaced it for free for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Butt cushion Day 1: Not happy. I didn't have pain in my tushy until I used this cushion. Every time I sit on it for a little while at my desk, my tushy starts to hurt and I have to get up and move around. This does not normally happen when I sit in my office chair. I thought the extra cushion would be a nice addition, but on Day 1 I'm hating it. I will give it some time and update my review if I have different results.Rating: 1 Star.Update Day 5: I tried multiple times to use this cushion according to the pictures given. Every single time it caused me pain. I took a break from it. Then I turned it around, so the empty section is in front instead of in back. Now I can sit on it without experiencing pain. This is usable and I get a little bit of cushion but I still have to figure out my proper placement on the cushion each time I use it.Plus: the sitting side of the cushion is super soft to the touch, and the cushion doesn't slide around on the chair due to the texture on the back side of it.Rating: 3 Stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, long lasting cushion.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased a 2nd one for our other vehicle for riding, not driving. I have used the driving one for years. It is supportive, it lifts me up a few inches ( I am 5 ft tall). It is helpful for leg and back pain, and it makes bumpy rides more tolerable while driving or riding.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My mom sits in a wheelchair and this cushion helps her coccyx.Very please with the product and that you can remove and wash the cover. Good product
I sleep much better without the pain in my neck. It works for me.

reviews.reviewTitle: I wish it were a little more wider
reviews.reviewText: The memory form cushion accessory for office chairs works fine as described. For an 8 hours long WFH, it does support your sitting posture greatly.However, I wish it were a little more wider, and that it filled a standard office chair. As of now, I have to place it exactly in the middle of the seat, and sit carefully.

reviews.reviewTitle: El mejor cojin de todos los que he probado
reviews.reviewText: He probado alrededor de 4 cojines diferentes y este es el que mejor me ha funcionado.Es el de mayor calidad sin duda.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 23, 2018
reviews.reviewText: The ComfiLife seat cushion did not disappoint. So easy to use and the cushion covering is a great help in giving my back an extra warm hug. As I said before Seating Bliss.
Bought it for ny girl coz she complained her butt pain. This cushion really relieved her pain and glad to see her finally can study without pain 😂
